body.bibl: Galletti, Mirella. “Vatican Dispatches on Assyro-Chaldeans, Kurds and Turkey (1935-1939): The Secretary of State Eugenio Pacelli, Later Pope Pius XII, and the Apostolic Delegate to Turkey, Angelo Giuseppe Roncalli, Later Pope John XXIII.” Journal of Assyrian Academic Studies 25:1-2 (2011): 98–131.
